org.json

类 XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.XML

  • public class XML
extends Object
    This provides static methods to convert an XML text into a JSONObject, and to covert a JSONObject into an XML text.
    版本:
    2016-08-10
    作者:
    JSON.org

    • 方法详细资料

      • codePointIterator

        private static Iterable<Integer> codePointIterator(String string)
        Creates an iterator for navigating Code Points in a string instead of characters. Once Java7 support is dropped, this can be replaced with string.codePoints() which is available in Java8 and above.
        另请参阅:
        http://stackoverflow.com/a/21791059/6030888

      • escape

        public static String escape(String string)
        Replace special characters with XML escapes: 
         & (ampersand) is replaced by &amp;
 < (less than) is replaced by &lt;
 > (greater than) is replaced by &gt;
 " (double quote) is replaced by &quot;
 ' (single quote / apostrophe) is replaced by &apos;
        参数:
        string - The string to be escaped.
        返回:
        The escaped string.

      • mustEscape

        private static boolean mustEscape(int cp)
        参数:
        cp - code point to test
        返回:
        true if the code point is not valid for an XML

      • unescape

        public static String unescape(String string)
        Removes XML escapes from the string.
        参数:
        string - string to remove escapes from
        返回:
        string with converted entities

      • noSpace

        public static void noSpace(String string)
                    throws JSONException
        Throw an exception if the string contains whitespace. Whitespace is not allowed in tagNames and attributes.
        参数:
        string - A string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if the string contains whitespace or is empty.

      • parse

        private static boolean parse(XMLTokener x,
                             JSONObject context,
                             String name,
                             boolean keepStrings)
                      throws JSONException
        Scan the content following the named tag, attaching it to the context.
        参数:
        x - The XMLTokener containing the source string.
        context - The JSONObject that will include the new material.
        name - The tag name.
        返回:
        true if the close tag is processed.
        抛出:
        JSONException

      • stringToValue

        public static Object stringToValue(String string)
        This method is the same as JSONObject.stringToValue(String) except that this also tries to unescape String values.
        参数:
        string - String to convert
        返回:
        JSON value of this string or the string

      • toJSONObject

        public static JSONObject toJSONObject(String string)
                               throws JSONException
        Convert a well-formed (but not necessarily valid) XML string into a JSONObject. Some information may be lost in this transformation because JSON is a data format and XML is a document format. XML uses elements, attributes, and content text, while JSON uses unordered collections of name/value pairs and arrays of values. JSON does not does not like to distinguish between elements and attributes. Sequences of similar elements are represented as JSONArrays. Content text may be placed in a "content" member. Comments, prologs, DTDs, and <[ [ ]]> are ignored.
        参数:
        string - The source string.
        返回:
        A JSONObject containing the structured data from the XML string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an errors while parsing the string

      • toJSONObject

        public static JSONObject toJSONObject(String string,
                                      boolean keepStrings)
                               throws JSONException
        Convert a well-formed (but not necessarily valid) XML string into a JSONObject. Some information may be lost in this transformation because JSON is a data format and XML is a document format. XML uses elements, attributes, and content text, while JSON uses unordered collections of name/value pairs and arrays of values. JSON does not does not like to distinguish between elements and attributes. Sequences of similar elements are represented as JSONArrays. Content text may be placed in a "content" member. Comments, prologs, DTDs, and <[ [ ]]> are ignored. All values are converted as strings, for 1, 01, 29.0 will not be coerced to numbers but will instead be the exact value as seen in the XML document.
        参数:
        string - The source string.
        keepStrings - If true, then values will not be coerced into boolean or numeric values and will instead be left as strings
        返回:
        A JSONObject containing the structured data from the XML string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an errors while parsing the string

      • toString

        public static String toString(Object object)
                       throws JSONException
        Convert a JSONObject into a well-formed, element-normal XML string.
        参数:
        object - A JSONObject.
        返回:
        A string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an error parsing the string

      • toString

        public static String toString(Object object,
                              String tagName)
                       throws JSONException
        Convert a JSONObject into a well-formed, element-normal XML string.
        参数:
        object - A JSONObject.
        tagName - The optional name of the enclosing tag.
        返回:
        A string.
        抛出:
        JSONException - Thrown if there is an error parsing the string
